mention.text: no date -- bogota domestic service in spanish at 0230 gmt

the government , in the case of the kidnapping of dr. montoya 's son , as on other unfortunate occasions , including the cases of dr. andres pastrana and dr. alvaro gomez , and even cases in which members of the armed forces have been kdnapped by subversives
the kidnapping of the son of the secretary general of the presidency
